oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Saturday Pre-Opry Show - 1957-03-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Saturday Pre-Opry Show, 1957-03-09, 6:00-6:30 pm, part 2. Recorded in Studio C at the National Life & Accident Insurance building. Personnel include Ott Devine (announcer), Roy Acuff (host, performer), Smoky Mountain Boys (performers), Kitty Wells (performer), Jimmy Riddle (performer), Johnnie & Jack (performers), Shot Jackson (performer), Gordon Terry (performer), Jerry Johnson (performer), Howdy Forrester (performer), and Bashful Brother Oswald (performer). Roy Acuff mentions the following program as featuring Ray Price and his Cherokee Cowboys, with announcer Dave Overton. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/531
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gordon Terry; Roy Acuff; Kitty Wells; Jerry Johnson; Johnnie & Jack; Howdy Forrester; Bashful Brother Oswald
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Service With A Smile (Gordon Terry) [continued from part 1] -- Roy Acuff introduces members of the cast -- Shake My Mother's Hand For Me (Roy Acuff, Kitty Wells, Jerry Johnson, Johnnie & Jack, Gordon Terry) -- Roy Acuff introduces Howdy Forrester -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Howdy Forrester) -- Roy Acuff introduces Kitty Wells -- Whose Shoulder Will You Cry On (Kitty Wells) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- My Gal's A High Born Lady (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff introduces Johnnie & Jack -- What About You (Johnnie & Jack, Shot Jackson) -- Roy Acuff introduces the following program -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Ott Devine)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Wells, Kitty; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Jackson, Shot; Crisp, Ray; Terry, Gordon; Johnson, Jerry (Bassist); Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Bashful Brother Oswald; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cherokee Cowboys (Musical group); Overton, Dave
